title: Inside Vogue Williams' wardrobe as her designer closet gets stylish detox after second wedding
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Vogue Williams has given her fans a glimpse of her home after having her dreamy walk-in wardrobe detoxed for the second time.

The 34-year-old has lavish cream wardrobes full of shoes, designer handbags and more gym-wear than anyone can imagine.

Handbags are perfectly displayed in tidy shelving units which fill the top of each wardrobe and Vogue shows off her numerous rails of clothing, including a large section for dresses, with everything placed in colour order.

The former Made In Chelsea star revealed to her 647K followers that she 'paid' Essex Style Sisters Gemma Lily and Charlotte to return for another wardrobe detox.

The professional wardrobe detoxers previously overhauled Vogue's Instagram-worthy closet back in August, but returned last week to tackle tidying her new purchases.

(Image: voguewilliams/Instagram)

(Image: PA)

Vogue recently married her husband Spencer Matthews for the second time in a ceremony officiated by Made In Chelsea pal Jamie Laing.

The couple originally married in a secret ceremony at the Matthews family's Glenn Affric estate in Scotland in the summer of 2018, in front of close family including his brother James and his wife Pippa Middleton.

After the second wedding this September, it seems that Vogue's clothes, shoes and bags have got slightly out-of-hand as she shared 'before' footage of heaps of crumpled clothing and mismatched shoes before the Style Sisters got to work.

(Image: voguewilliams/Instagram)

(Image: voguewilliams/Instagram)

The famously organised duo documented the process of Vogue's second wardrobe transformation and posted 'before' and 'after' snaps.

They gave viewers an inside look at Vogue's dedicated gym closet which featured over 30 pairs of trainers and all the reality star's work-out outfits.

The Style Sisters told their followers: "Today we are back in Vogue William's house and everything is back where we left it... however, she has a lot more stuff now."

(Image: voguewilliams/Instagram)

One of the pair added: "But I think she has been shoe shopping!"

Behind-the-scenes snaps showed Vogue and the Style Sisters 'drowning in gym-wear' and attempting to organise the heaps of clothing.

The finished result was flaunted with Instagram story footage which showed off luxury cashmeres and jumpers, all colour co-ordinated.

Vogue also pointed out the many items of clothing strewn across the carpet that she planned to give to charity.

(Image: voguewilliams/Instagram)

(Image: voguewilliams/Instagram)

After the transformation, Vogue revealed to Instagram: "I wouldn't be able to do what they do on my own."

She continued: "I might even have to get them back to help me with the rest of the house.

(Image: voguewilliams/Instagram)

"I feel a weight has been lifted off my shoulders and I am so delighted."

Vogue's post-wedding wardrobe transformation comes as the star said 'I do' for the second time and admitted she'd 'love another baby' just eight months after giving birth.

The TV presenter recently revealed how she is already thinking about having more children with hubby Spencer Matthews .

(Image: Hollicom)

The couple met in 2017 while competing in Channel 4’s The Jump.

The ex- Dancing with the Stars celeb only had first baby Theodore last September.

But she says: “I would definitely like two more and possibly three but it’s a lot of work so we will see how we feel after baby no.2."

(Image: Instagram)

She added: "I want to enjoy Theodore for a little while longer but not too much either because there is not too much space between my sister and I and we are the best of friends and I would like that for Theodore too.

"A two year gap would be perfect."

It looks like Vogue and Spencer may need the Style Sisters to return in the future to make space in Theodore's wardrobe for baby no.2...
description: Vogue's wardrobe gets another wardrobe overhaul after her second wedding and boasts hundreds of shoes and bundles of clothes
